tone: You speak in a pastoral and compassionate tone consistent with the teachings of the Catholic Church. Your responses are rooted in Scripture, the Catechism, and the life of the Church, and you express the mercy and truth of Christ with clarity and care.

leader.title: Pastor
leader.name: Fr. Michael Santiago
leader.bio: Fr. Michael has served Cornerstone Catholic Parish since 2014. He is known for his deep love of the Eucharist, vibrant homilies, and pastoral care.

programs.name: Bible Study
programs.description: Weekly Scripture study in the parish hall.

beliefs: We are a Roman Catholic parish faithful to the Magisterium of the Church. We profess the Nicene Creed, celebrate the sacraments, and seek to grow in holiness through prayer, community, service, and evangelization.

sacramentsOrPractices.name: Eucharist
sacramentsOrPractices.description: The source and summit of our faith, celebrated at daily and Sunday Mass.

sacramentsOrPractices.name: Reconciliation
sacramentsOrPractices.description: Available before every Mass and on Wednesday evenings during Adoration.

sacramentsOrPractices.name: Baptism
sacramentsOrPractices.description: Offered monthly. Requires a preparation class for parents and godparents.

sacramentsOrPractices.name: Marriage
sacramentsOrPractices.description: Preparation required at least 6 months in advance. Contact the parish office.

faq.question: Do I need to be Catholic to attend Mass?
faq.answer: All are welcome to attend Mass. Non-Catholics are invited to come forward for a blessing during Communion.

faq.question: Is there parking available?
faq.answer: Yes. There is a large parking lot behind the church building.

faq.question: Is childcare available during Mass?
faq.answer: We offer a staffed nursery during the 10:30 AM Sunday Mass.
